meanings.definition: The act of conceiving again or differently.
meanings.sent1: After much thought, her reconception of the problem led to a creative solution.
meanings.sent2: The reconception of the art project brought fresh ideas to the table.
meanings.sent3: His reconception of the recipe turned out to be a delicious disaster.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of thoughts, a reconception bloomed into a beautiful new idea.
meanings.sent5: The reconception of the story made it more exciting and engaging.

meanings.definition: A new or different understanding or interpretation.
meanings.sent1: The scientist's reconception of the data changed the course of the experiment.
meanings.sent2: Her reconception of the historical event shed light on its true significance.
meanings.sent3: The reconception of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: In the world of art, a reconception can turn a simple painting into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The reconception of the theory challenged traditional beliefs and opened new possibilities.
